bibl.title: An Unnoticed Allusion in Theocritus and Callimachus.
bibl.note: The term schoinos is adopted by both Theocritus (Id. VII, 133) and Callimachus (Aitia, Prol. 18). The echo has significance and relevance whichever poet or poem is asumed to have priority.
bibl.seg: Goldhill Simon, An Unnoticed Allusion in Theocritus and Callimachus.
The term schoinos is adopted by both Theocritus (Id. VII, 133) and Callimachus (Aitia, Prol. 18). The echo has significance and relevance whichever poet or poem is asumed to have priority.
